creator: KBC Groep NV
descriptionHtml:
Get the KBC Brussels Sign app to securely log in to and authorise transactions and documents through various KBC e-banking services.

Use the KBC Brussels Sign smartphone app to securely access a number of KBC's e-banking services like Touch, Invest and Online for Business on your computer (PC or Mac) and authorise transactions. Note that KBC Brussels Sign is primarily a security app that also allows you to sign transactions and documents, not a fully fledged e-banking app.

How it works
Go to the login page for the e-banking service you want to use on your computer and select 'KBC Brussels Sign' for secure access. Enter your identification code to display a unique QR code on your computer screen. Scan the QR code with your KBC Brussels Sign app and enter your 5-digit PIN on your smartphone to access the relevant e-banking service on your computer.
It's that easy and secure, including when you use it to authorise transactions and documents online.

Requirements
Say goodbye to e-banking access requiring additional hardware like a card reader or extra software on your computer. All you need is your KBC Brussels Sign app and Internet access on your smartphone.

If you're a personal banking customer with us, you can now securely access that with our Sign app. Just activate it using your debit card and card reader or through our Mobile app (if activated on your smartphone) and you're off.

Businesses can apply for your KBC Brussels Sign app activation codes today at your KBC Bank branch or through your KBC-Online for Business administrator.
Features
- Log in securely to a range of KBC e-banking services on your computer
- Authorise easily transactions and documents
- Have it with you on your phone wherever you are and conveniently at your fingertips 24/7

KBC Brussels processes your personal data using essential cookies in order to guarantee secure mobile banking. More information in this regard can be found in the cookie policy for this app.
descriptionShort: Log in securely to KBC online services and easily sign your online transactions.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
﻿As a regular KBC Brussels Sign user, you've provided us with interesting feedback, for which we thank you!
We're already busy doing what we can to make KBC Brussels Sign even better.
What's new?
- Minor optimizations
If you have more tips, remarks or ideas, be sure to let us know on Facebook or Twitter @KBCBrussels.

title: KBC Brussels Sign

creator: KBC Groep NV
descriptionHtml:
About this app

Securely log in and easily sign all your online transactions

The KBC Brussels Sign for Business app enables business and corporate customers to log in securely and to validate and sign transactions and documents in the KBC Brussels Business Dashboard.

The KBC Brussels Sign for Business app keeps your KBC Brussels Business Dashboard secure, letting you use your phone to easily and securely log in and to validate and sign transactions and documents. It's not an e-banking app, but a security app.

How does it work?
To log in to the e-banking application on your PC (or Mac), navigate to the application's login page and select ‘KBC Brussels Sign’ as your login method. After entering your ID code, a unique QR code appears on your computer screen. When you read this QR code with the KBC Brussels Sign for Business app and enter your five-character code on your phone, you can access the KBC Brussels Business Dashboard on your PC (or Mac). Simple, straightforward and secure. The same process applies for validating and signing online transactions and documents.

Requirements
You don't need any additional hardware or software for your PC (or Mac). All you need is the KBC Brussels Sign for Business app on your phone and an Internet connection.

For business owners: you can request the codes for activating KBC Brussels Sign for Business from your KBC Brussels Bank branch or the administrator of your KBC Brussels-Online for Business subscription.

KBC Brussels Sign for Business at a glance:
– securely log in to e-banking applications (on PC)
– easily validate and sign transactions and documents
– quick and convenient using your phone

KBC Brussels processes personal details using strictly necessary cookies in order to guarantee the security of mobile banking. You can find more information in the cookie policy for this application.
descriptionShort: Log in securely to KBC online services and easily sign your online transactions.

﻿As a regular KBC Brussels Sign for Business user, you've provided us with interesting feedback, for which we thank you!
We're already busy doing what we can to make KBC Brussels Sign for Business even better.

If you have more tips, remarks or ideas, be sure to let us know on Facebook or Twitter @KBCBrussels.

Requirements
You don't need any additional hardware or software for your PC (or Mac). All you need is the KBC Brussels Sign for Business app on your phone and an Internet connection.

For business owners: you can request the codes for activating KBC Brussels Sign for Business from your KBC Brussels Bank branch or the administrator of your KBC Brussels-Online for Business subscription.

KBC Brussels Sign for Business at a glance:
– securely log in to e-banking applications (on PC)
– easily validate and sign transactions and documents
– quick and convenient using your phone

KBC Brussels processes personal details using strictly necessary cookies in order to guarantee the security of mobile banking. You can find more information in the cookie policy for this application.
descriptionShort: Log in securely to KBC online services and easily sign your online transactions.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
As a regular KBC Brussels Sign for Business user, you've provided us with interesting feedback, for which we thank you!
We're already busy doing what we can to make KBC Brussels Sign for Business even better.
What's new?
- Minor optimizations
If you have more tips, remarks or ideas, be sure to let us know on Facebook or Twitter @KBCBrussels.
